column3: ## Change language when NOT logged in
Make sure you are logged out of the application

column4: You will be redirected to login page

column3: Click the dropdown which shows `English`, `Français`. the dropdown box is located on the right side above the `Application Progress` menu
Select `Français` if you are in English language.

column4: The text on the application form changes to French language
You are logged in and redirected to Application Form
The text on the application form is in French language
